mapper.insert: insert into users (userId, userPwd, userName, phone, email, email2, zipNo, addrBasic, addrDetail) values(#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{email2}, #{zipNo}, #{addrBasic}, #{addrDetail})
mapper.select: select * from users where userId = #{userId} and userPwd = #{userPwd}
select count(*) as result from users where userId = #{userId}
select r.*,p.name,uploadpath,filename,filerealname,fileloca,tel from users u left join reservation r on u.userId=r.id left join product p on r.pro_no=p.pro_no where u.userId=#{id}
select r.*,p.name,tel from users u left join review r on u.userId = r.id left join product p on r.pro_no=p.pro_no where u.userId=#{id}
